results.title: Metformin and fibromyalgia pathophysiology: current insights and promising future therapeutic strategies.
results.text_hl: Recent studies have suggested that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, a widely used antidiabetic drug, may have potential therapeutic benefits for @<m>DISEASE_Chronic_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D059350 @@@chronic pain conditions@@@, including @DISEASE_Fibromyalgia @DISEASE_MESH:D005356 @@@FM@@@.

results.title: Sex differences in the orofacial antinociceptive effect of metformin and the role of transient receptor potential channels.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ promotes orofacial antinociception in both sexes in @DISEASE_Acute_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D059787 @@@acute pain@@@ and is more effective in @<m>DISEASE_Chronic_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D059350 @@@chronic pain@@@ in females than in males, through the modulation of @GENE_TRPV1 @GENE_7442 @@@TRPV1@@@ and @GENE_TRPA1 @GENE_8989 @@@TRPA1@@@ channels.

Sex differences in the orofacial antinociceptive effect of metformin and the role of transient receptor potential channels. Naunyn Schmiedebergs Arch Pharmacol. 2024 Oct 2;():. PMID: 39356320

results.title: The effect of the anti-diabetic drug metformin on musculoskeletal pain: A cross-sectional study with 21,889 individuals from the UK biobank.
results.text_hl: Participants reported @DISEASE_Musculoskeletal_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D059352 @@@musculoskeletal pain@@@ that had interfered with their usual activities in the last month (recent @DISEASE_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@), and for more than 3 months (@<m>DISEASE_Chronic_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D059350 @@@chronic pain@@@). We performed logistic regression analyses for recent and @<m>DISEASE_Chronic_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D059350 @@@chronic pain@@@ for each site and for multisite @DISEASE_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@ among participants with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ who did or did not take @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Carvalho-E-Silva AP, Harmer AR, Ferreira ML, Ferreira PH. The effect of the anti-diabetic drug metformin on musculoskeletal pain: A cross-sectional study with 21,889 individuals from the UK biobank. Eur J Pain. 2021 Jul;25(6):1264-1273. PMID: 33561890

results.title: The Antidiabetic Drug Metformin Regulates Voltage-Gated Sodium Channel NaV1.7 via the Ubiquitin-Ligase NEDD4-2
results.text_hl: The antidiabetic drug @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has been shown to reduce @DISEASE_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain hypersensitivity@@@ in preclinical models of @<m>DISEASE_Chronic_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D059350 @@@chronic pain@@@ and in @DISEASE_Neuralgia @DISEASE_MESH:D009437 @@@neuropathic pain@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@humans@@@.
